DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Rival of Hong Kong, China
   Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team beat the rival of Hong Kong of China 19-0 in the Asian regional qualifier of Group B for the 29th Olympics held at the Kim Il Sung Stadium here Sunday.
